member.name: PUBAPPINFOFLAGS
member.summary: Specifies which members in the structure are valid. These flags are bitmasks set in the dwMask member and passed to .

member.name: PUBAPPINFOFLAGS.PAI_SOURCE
member.summary: The string is valid and contains the display name of the publishing source. If multiple sources publish an application of the same name, Add/Remove Programs identifies them by "<application name> : <publishing source>".

member.name: PUBAPPINFOFLAGS.PAI_ASSIGNEDTIME
member.summary: The member is valid and contains the time that the application should be installed as assigned by an application administrator.

member.name: PUBAPPINFOFLAGS.PAI_SCHEDULEDTIME
member.summary: The member is valid and contains the time that the application should be installed as assigned by the user.

member.name: PUBAPPINFOFLAGS.PAI_EXPIRETIME
member.summary: The member is valid and contains the time after which Add/Remove Programs should no longer install the program.
